Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2018 04:10PM LindaSuz wrote: I am going through this now. It is so itchy and is spreading like poison ivy---they are raided, round pimple like thing that weep and ooze. I was told to use hydrocortisone, but learned that it contains estrogen and I test positive for estrogen and progesterone. Nice doc. May try aloe tomorrow as I am going crazy.
Posts.Title: Weird Skin Reaction Post-Radiation Jo_Ann_K LindaSuz
